alert.note: Alert for Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Union County through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Etta, or 8 miles west of New Albany, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Albany, Keownville, New Harmony, Etta, Pinedale, Sherman, Myrtle, Blue Springs, Shari, Poolville, Graham, Branyan, Ellistown, Old Myrtle, Pumpkin Center, Jug Fork, Baker, Locum, Smalco and Glenfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
